entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:21 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 3:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -20.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: E 85 km/h gust 95 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 30 km/h except 80 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
